titles.title: I Am Thine, O Lord (Fanny J. Crosby)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 c2 v2 v3 v4 v5

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O the pure delight of a single hour That before Thy throne I spend, When I kneel in prayer, and with Thee, my God, I commune as friend with friend!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
